comments:
In a java file with the persistence view open, select a mapped mapping(say Id), then select the entity, then select an unmapped mapping.  You will get a classCastException like the following and the Persistence Details view will not populate correctly.

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.jpa.core.internal.content.java.mappings.JavaNullAttributeMapping
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.mappings.details.ManyToManyComposite.doPopulate(ManyToManyComposite.java:123)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaController.populate(BaseJpaController.java:69)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.details.PersistentAttributeDetailsPage.populateMappingPage(PersistentAttributeDetailsPage.java:317)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.details.PersistentAttributeDetailsPage.populateMappingComboAndPage(PersistentAttributeDetailsPage.java:310)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.details.PersistentAttributeDetailsPage.doPopulate(PersistentAttributeDetailsPage.java:273)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaDetailsPage.doPopulate(BaseJpaDetailsPage.java:36)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaController.populate(BaseJpaController.java:69)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.details.BaseJpaDetailsPage.populate(BaseJpaDetailsPage.java:31)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.views.JpaDetailsView.setCurrentPage(JpaDetailsView.java:139)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.views.JpaDetailsView.select(JpaDetailsView.java:60)
at org.eclipse.jpa.ui.internal.selection.JpaDetailsSelectionParticipant.selectionChanged(JpaDetailsSelectionParticipant.java:31)
Fixed this for 1.0 M6.  small problem in the unpopulate process
